item.description:
Greeting Fellow Volunteers,

Looking for a fun new way to volunteer? Help seniors, children and people with disabilities get healthy exercise and feel welcome and included at dozens of fun community salsa events this summer and beyond!

Side benefit: Learn to dance salsa (or improve your moves if you already know how) and meet lots of great people who care about helping their communities!

Set-up begins at 4pm, and Clean-up ends at 9:30 pm. We need help throughout the evening, but the most important times are at the beginning and end!  Come at 4pm for a brief orientation, and to get started volunteering.  People who start helping at 4pm will be finished by 6pm, and can help for longer or just stay and enjoy the fun of the event!  If you want to come for a later shift, please contact Nathan to sign up:  nsvelazquez@metamovements.net

When & Where:

Monday, June 10, 4:00-9:30 pm (or a shorter block of time in the middle)

Salsa in the Park

Blackstone Community Center Courtyard (and auditorium)

On the corner of Washington & W Brookline Streets in the South End.  (near Stella's & the Salvation Army)

Schedule of Meet-up:

4:00-4:15 pm Meet the directors and other volunteers that you will be working with to make this amazing event possible!  Get a quick overview of how things will flow during the event.

4:15-5:30 pm Take a tour of the area we use for the event, and learn how to set up the space for safe, inclusive access for people with disabilities, seniors, small children, and the rest of the community.  Together we will make it wonderful!

5:30-5:45 pm Meet-up/Training wraps up, and the event begins!  You will train new volunteers arriving to take over for what you are doing.  Then you can sign up for more volunteer shifts, or join in the lessons!

Can't make it this week, but still want to volunteer?


Just contact us at 888 982 6382 or at info@metamovements.com, and we'll let you know about other ways to get involved.

 

The Boston Volunteers

Big enough to deliver, small enough to care

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org


Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the courtyard, right in front of the building. If you are late or it is raining, just come inside and ask for "Salsa" at the desk. We'll provide a cell # for your convenience :)

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer a shift at "Salsa in the Park"...and learn some fun dance moves too!
